answers.answer: I forgot to mention that I started taking thyroid medication last week.  My bloodwork for thyroid is normal but on the low end and dr. wants to bring it up, that's why I'm on meds.

question: I had GD on my first pregnancy and was able to control my glucose with diet and exercise.  I'm pregnant again (with twins) and was tested early because of GD history.  I have GD again.  My glucose has been within target most of the time except last week.  My glucose was out of range in the morning before breakfast.  But I also noticed that my glucose meter may not be very accurate.  My OB wants to start me on insulin at bedtime.  This week, my glucose is ok again, without insulin.  Should I start taking insulin if my glucose is back to normal range?  What is the side effect of taking insulin when glucose is within normal range?
title: Gestational diabetes and insulin
